attributes.action: Erect a statue of Nigel Farage on the 4th plinth in Trafalgar Square
attributes.background: Nigel Farage has made seismic changes on the UK political landscape by forcing a referendum on the EU and mobilising millions of people to vote to leave. His impact is historic and should be celebrated as an example to UK subjects what devotion and force of will can achieve.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of the London Assembly. 

The Fourth Plinth Project is administered by the London Assembly as an arts project. More information is available here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/what-we-do/arts-and-culture/art-and-design/fourth-plinth
